answers.answer: I don't think that's a good sign, its a bit too soon for that.. check with your doctor, my cousin had swollen feet and ended up with preeclampsia.. But I might be wrong look for other signs.. Good luck:)

Its normal. I too started with swollen feets tgis early. Dr said its normal till u have a normal blood pressure and other parts of ur body are not swollen (face, hands). When u walk too much this will happen and be there till the end deae till u deliver. If its normal swelling its totally normal.U can use 2-3pillows below ur feet while resting ir sleeping. This helped me a lot. Hope this helps u too :)
I'm 23 weeks and mine starting swelling is it muggy or hot where you live? That can cause you to swell
Well the swelling went away and came back with a vengance my hands are a little swollen now but i have a doc appointment tomorrow at 7:30am so we sha see what they tell me! Wish me luck!

question: Im 18 + 2  my feet and ankles have been swelling...i guess my question is why am i swelling this early in pregnancy? And what should i do?
title: swelling in early pregnancy?!
